original_solution_mapping.L1: 35% of the cookies have nuts and chocolate chips because 100 - 25 - 40 = <<100-25-40=35>>35
original_solution_mapping.L2: 60% of the cookies have nuts in them because 25 + 35 = <<25+35=60>>60
original_solution_mapping.L3: She makes 36 cookies with nuts in them because 60 x .6 =<<36=36>>36

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3574.
    Returns: the total number of nuts needed.
    """
    # L1
    total_percent = 100 # WK
    nuts_fraction_percent = 25 # 1/4 of her cookies to have nuts in them (1/4 = 25%)
    chocolate_chips_percent = 40 # 40% to have chocolate chips in them
    nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent = total_percent - nuts_fraction_percent - chocolate_chips_percent

    # L2
    total_nuts_percent = nuts_fraction_percent + nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent

    # L3
    total_cookies = 60 # If she makes 60 cookies
    total_nuts_decimal = 0.6 # WK
    cookies_with_nuts = total_cookies * total_nuts_decimal

    # L4
    nuts_per_cookie = 2 # uses 2 nuts per cookie
    total_nuts_needed = cookies_with_nuts * nuts_per_cookie

    # FA
    answer = total_nuts_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: 35% of the cookies have nuts and chocolate chips because {total_percent} - {nuts_fraction_percent} - {chocolate_chips_percent} = <<{total_percent}-{nuts_fraction_percent}-{chocolate_chips_percent}={nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent}>>{nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent}

60% of the cookies have nuts in them because {nuts_fraction_percent} + {nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent} = <<{nuts_fraction_percent}+{nuts_and_chocolate_chips_percent}={total_nuts_percent}>>{total_nuts_percent}
She makes {cookies_with_nuts} cookies with nuts in them because {total_cookies} x {total_nuts_decimal} =<<{cookies_with_nuts}={cookies_with_nuts}>>{cookies_with_nuts}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: 60% of the cookies have nuts in them because 25 + 35 = <<25+35=60>>60
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: She makes 36 cookies with nuts in them because 60 x 0.6 =<<36=36>>36

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'nuts_fraction_percent' (25) was used instead of 'nuts_per_cookie' (2).
